sourcesContent:
import React from "react"
import {PostItem,PostImg,PostTitle,PostDesc} from "./styles/poststyle"
import TimeAgo from 'timeago-react'
const Post = ({item}) =>{
return(
    <PostItem>
    <PostImg src = {item.photo} />
    <PostTitle>{item.title}</PostTitle>

    <TimeAgo datetime = {item.createdAt}  />
    <PostDesc>{item.description}</PostDesc>
    </PostItem>
)
}
export default Post
